short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate strong, secure passwords and passphrases effortlessly with our customizable Password Generator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Password Generator is a simple and secure tool designed to help you create strong passwords and passphrases that enhance your online security. Whether you need complex passwords with random characters or easy-to-remember passphrases, Password Generator has you covered.

Key Features:

Random Character Passwords: Customize your password with a choice of letters, numbers, special characters, and capital letters. Set your preferred length and instantly generate strong, unique passwords.

Secure Passphrases: Generate secure, memorable passphrases with random words, providing a balance between security and usability.

Copy to Clipboard: Quickly copy your generated password or passphrase with one click, making it easy to use across websites and applications.

Customizable Options: Adjust the length of passwords and the number of words in passphrases to meet various security requirements.

User-Friendly Interface: Switch seamlessly between password types with a clean, intuitive design.
This extension does not store or transmit any data, ensuring your generated passwords remain private. Protect your online accounts with Password Generator and create secure passwords with ease!
